title: NO LEASE!!! NO CREDIT CHECK!!!! MOVE IN SPECIAL!!!
posting_body: We're 10 minutes from the Galleria area and 20 minutes to Downtown Houston.
There are several shopping, eating, grocery and public transportation options within a five minute walking distance of the property.
All of our suites include:
· ALL UTILITIES
· Full size refrigerator
· Microwave
· Four Burner Stove with Oven
· Free WIFI
· On-site Security
· Flat Screen TV's with 50 cable channels
Additional benefit features include:
Inside laundry facility
Fitness Center
Gated outdoor swimming pool
We Are A Pet Friendly Property!!
We have an outdoor pool and fitness center on site.
***Please note: room totals do not include tax***
**Limited to first time guests.
Must mention offer at time of reservation.
**Price of $420 for the first WEEK or $1550 for the first month!!!
There is a $50 incidental deposit that is required at check-in.
Prices subject to change.
*Pets are always welcome at Extended Stay America.
A maximum of two pets are allowed in each suite.

A $25 (+ tax) per day, per pet non-refundable cleaning fee for the first month (not to exceed $150 + tax per pet), Each month thereafter is a $10 non-refundable fee (+tax) per day for the first 5 days of each month (not to exceed $50 + tax per month, per pet).
This fee is to cover the cost of cleaning and fumigating guest room.
Height and length restrictions apply: pets can be no longer than 36 inches and no taller than 36 inches.
Larger, or more than two pets requires property manager's approval.
All rates are due in full at time of check -in.
